name: New Super Lazer Dance Club Simulator
name_original: New Super Lazer Dance Club Simulator
description:
Enter the New Super Lazer Dance Club Simulator! 

 Just sit , relax , grab a beer and enjoy watching a dance club filled with AI's !

Music by SKEAZ : https://soundcloud.com/skeaz

Arts Numeriques : http://www.stluc-bruxelles-esa.be/
